attributes.action: Scrap the Proposed ID CArds as the the government has proved beyond doubt that
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they are incapable of protecting the collected data and this would be against the individuals Human Rights

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/No-IDs-more-PCs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
